title.narrative: Irrigation: Project for Strengthening the Resilience of Small Farmers to the consequences of the COVID-19 pandemic

description.narrative: The project aims to increase the resilience capacity of smallholder farmers and vulnerable associative structures of rural communities through the rehabilitation of small productive irrigation infrastructures and the supply of agricultural inputs. Project goal. PURRACO project goal is to alleviate acute food insecurity and the drop in household incomes that result from COVID-19 containment measures. Specific objectives. Increase the resilience of smallholder farmers and rural organizations while supporting the rapid recovery of agricultural production and incomes through: (i) Rehabilitation of productive infrastructure (small-scale irrigation systems) and provision of agricultural inputs; and (ii) Support to short-cycle animal husbandry.The project aims to increase the support to the development of nutritious small livestock production models (goats, poultry and pigs) in order to mitigate the impacts of covid-19.
